JavascriptEvents_key2:
Aapne pehle dekha ki aapa webpage user ke mouse pointer move karne se snowfall ka direction change kar raha tha.
Mouse pointer move hona ek user event hai.
JavascriptEvents_key3: User webpage pe bahut sare events produce kar sakta hai, jaise:
JavascriptEvents_key4: click (jab user kahin click karta hai)
JavascriptEvents_key10: Aapka webpage bhi inn user events ko sunn sakta hai aur kuch action le sakta hai. Agar aap apne webpage ke *window* mein *click* event sunna chahte hain toh apne javscript mein:
JavascriptEvents_key11:
Yeh `code` "click" event ko listen karta hai aur "click" hone par, function ke andar jo bhi instructions hain use `execute` kar deta hai.
*Note*: ""window" javascript mein ek pre-defined Object hai. Aur "addEventListener" ek pre-defined method hai. Hum iske baare mein aage aur padhenge.
JavascriptEvents_key13: Pichle example project (creating snowfall) mein, ek click listener add karo. User ke click karne se snowfall ka color change kar do.
JavascriptEvents_key14:
"click" ke alawa doosre events ke saath experiment kijiye jaise "`key`press", "resize" etc.
...
